sentences.en: Add edges to the graph, and assign each edge an ID number.
sentences.cn: 向图中增加边, 并为每条边赋予ID数.

sentences.en: And remember to take your ID card along.
Did you get an ID on the dead body in the trunk?
sentences.cn: 确认了后备箱里尸体的身份了 么 ?

sentences.en: Discounts will only be given on production of your student ID card.
sentences.cn: 须出示学生证方可打折.

sentences.en: I had no ID on me so I couldn't prove I was the owner of the car.
sentences.cn: 我身上没带身份证件，也就无法证实我就是车主。

sentences.en: If you've forgotten your login ID, click this link.
sentences.cn: 如果忘记了自己的注册账号就点击此链接。

sentences.en: May I apply for my ID card in the local police station here?
sentences.cn: 我可以向你们当地公安机关申请办理居民身份证吗？

sentences.en: May I have a look at your passport or ID card , sir?
sentences.cn: 我可以看一下你的护照或身份证 吗 ?

sentences.en: Peter took out his wallet and showed his ID to the man.
sentences.cn: 彼得掏出钱包向那人出示他的身份证件。

sentences.en: Play home XXX use no allow ID and be clean.
sentences.cn: 玩家XXX使用不允许的ID而被清理.

sentences.en: So that's how you got gwen creighton's id card?
sentences.cn: 你就是那样取得温克雷顿的钥匙卡的?

sentences.en: The capital of my country id Beijing.
This is the charge for you ID calls.
sentences.cn: 这是你的国际长途电话费用.

sentences.en: Yes. Now please show me your ID card.
sentences.cn: 没错,请把您的身份证件给我看一下好吗?

sentences.en: You must carry ID at all times.
sentences.cn: 你必须随身携带身份证件。

phrases.tran_cn: 产品编号；产品标识码；商品编号

trans.tran_cn: 身份证(identification的缩写)，（电台或电视台暂时中断广播以宣布台名而出现的）间歇，停顿 (identification 的缩写)
